CustomField.description: This field is designed as a temporary override of the 'Opp Prod Line Term' field to account for historical Opp/Product data that was created before CPQ was rolled out. This should be deleted after a full migration to CPQ architecture is completed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is designed as a temporary override of the 'Opp Prod Line Term' field to account for historical Opp/Product data that was created before CPQ was rolled out. This should be deleted after a full migration to CPQ architecture is completed.
CustomField.label: Opp Prod Line Term (Override)
